document_name: Law no 0875 on Principles of Monitoring, Reporting and Verification of GHG Emissions
document_description:
This law aims at aligning the country's emission monitoring framework with the EU ETS and non-ETS legislation, notably Directive 2003/87/EC. 

The law mandates industrial actors to set plans for monitoring and reporting their emissions. It will enter into force on January 1st, 2021. Secondary legislation is currently being discussed.
